video_prompt: **Prompt:** Ethereal forest: Bubbles drift and shimmer. Mushroom caps subtly glow and shift color, their ruffled gills gently undulating. Moss and fern-like plants softly sway. Luminescence pulses, illuminating the scene. Background blurs and refocuses.
image_prompt: **Vibrant, fantastical forest scene: majestic central mushroom (pink-to-blue-white cap, ruffled gills, tan stem with orange beads), surrounded by diverse, colorful smaller mushrooms on dark, mossy ground with fern-like plants. Numerous iridescent bubbles float throughout, creating a magical, dreamlike atmosphere with soft, diffused lighting and a blurred green/blue background. Fairy tale, ethereal, rich in color and texture.**
refined_video_prompt: Bubbles drift and subtly shimmer. Mushroom caps actively shift color, their ruffled gills gently undulating. Moss and fern-like plants softly sway. Luminescence pulses through the scene, dynamically altering its illumination as the background smoothly blurs and refocuses.
